original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha is the purification of perceptions.

original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad @90b mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad @90b mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of perception.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha and the purity of perception and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual. They are not separate and not distinct.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of volitional factors is due to the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of volitional factors.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha and the purity of volitional factors and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual. They are not separate and not distinct.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the eighteen aspects of the Buddha.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the eighteen aspects of the Buddha is due to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, Subhūti, this purity of the eighteen aspects of the Buddha and this purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two, nor are they divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
translated: They are not broken apart, nor are they otherwise than what they are.🔽The purity of the eye is due to the purity of the eighteen aspects of the Buddha.

original: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the eighteen aspects of the Buddha is due to the purity of the eye.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha and the purification of the eyes are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par @91a *//
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par @91a *//
translated: and cannot be made two.

original: dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha is the purification of the ears.

original: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the ears is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha and the purification of the ears and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and cannot be made two.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha is the purification of the nose.

original: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the nose is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the unshared qualities of a buddha and the purity of the nose and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lce rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lce rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the unshared qualities of a buddha is the purity of the tongue.

original: lce rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the tongue is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the unshared qualities of a buddha and the purity of the tongue and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the body is due to the purity of the distinct attributes of the Buddha.

original: lus rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the body.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par @91b dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par @91b dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the distinct attributes of the Buddha and the purity of the body and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the mind is due to the purity of the distinct attributes of the Buddha.

original: yid rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the mind.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the distinct attributes of the Buddha and the purity of the mind and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided, nor is it cut apart.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the form aggregate is the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par bdag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par bdag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha and the purity of the form aggregate and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas sgra rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas sgra rnam par dag pa /
translated: nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the sound aggregate is the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha.

original: sgra rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sgra rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / sgra rnam par dag pa dang; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / sgra rnam par dag pa dang; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha, the purification of sound, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas dri rnam @92a *//🔽par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas dri rnam @92a *// par dag pa /
translated: “The purification of smell is the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: dri rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: dri rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of smell is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / dri rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / dri rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha, the purification of smell, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas ro rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas ro rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purification of taste is the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: ro rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / ro rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: ro rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / ro rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the sense of taste is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the unshared qualities of the Buddha and the purity of the sense of taste and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual; they are not separate and not distinct.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas reg rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas reg rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the unshared qualities of the Buddha is the purity of contact.

original: reg rnam par dag pas rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / reg rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: reg rnam par dag pas rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / reg rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of contact is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the unshared qualities of the Buddha and the purity of contact and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual; they are not separate and not distinct.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas chos rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas chos rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the Dharma is due to the purity of the unshared qualities of the Buddha.

original: chos rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: chos rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the Dharma.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos @92b rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos @92b rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the unshared qualities of the Buddha and the purity of the Dharma and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not separated, and not cut apart.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the eye consciousness is due to the purity of the unshared qualities of the Buddha.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the eye consciousness.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the buddhadharmas and the purification of the eye consciousness are one thing and not two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: There is no duality here, no division, no discrimination.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the buddhadharmas is the purification of the ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang /
translated: The purification of the ear consciousness is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects. Thus, the purification of the buddhadharmas and the purification of the ear consciousness and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: There is no duality here, no division, no discrimination.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the nose consciousness is due to the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams @93a *//
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams @93a *//
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the nose consciousness.

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha and the purity of the nose consciousness and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and are not different.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the tongue consciousness is due to the purity of the unentangled qualities of the Buddha.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the tongue consciousness.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the buddhadharmas and the purification of the tongue consciousness and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.🔽They are not two and cannot be split into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the buddhadharmas is the purification of the body consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: and the purification of the body consciousness is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the buddhadharmas and the purification of the body consciousness and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two and cannot be split into two.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the mental consciousness is due to the purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the mental consciousness.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam @93b par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam @93b par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha and the purity of the mental consciousness and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and are not different.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of sights is due to the purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the sense field of sights.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purification of the buddhadharmas is the purification of ear contact.🔽The purification of ear contact is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purification of the buddhadharmas and the purification of ear contact and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: not divided, not discriminated.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the buddhadharmas is the purification of nose contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of nose contact is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the buddhadharmas and the purification of nose contact and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: not divided, not discriminated.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the nose sense field is the purity of the nose.🔽The purity of the nose is the purity of the nose consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam @94a *//🔽par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam @94a *// par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the nose consciousness is the purity of all phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: In this way, Śāradvatīputra, the purity of the nose sense field and the purity of the nose and the purity of the nose consciousness and the purity of all phenomena are one in their purity, not two, not divided.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang; lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang; lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the buddhadharmas and the purification of tongue contact are one thing, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects is another,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: but although they are described as two things, in their purified state they are not two and cannot be divided into two, and they are not sundered and are not cut apart.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the buddhadharmas is the purification of body contact,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: and the purification of body contact is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects. Thus, the purification of the buddhadharmas and the purification of body contact

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing, and although they are described as two things, in their purified state they are not two and cannot be divided into two, and they are not sundered and are not cut apart.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of mental contact is due to the purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of mental contact.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par @94b dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par @94b dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha and the purity of mental contact and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽The purity of the sense field of the eyes is due to the purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.🔽The purity of the sense field of the eyes is due to the purity of the sense field of phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of phenomena is due to the purity of the sense field of the mental faculty.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the mental faculty is due to the purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.🔽The purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha is due to the purity of the sense field of the mental faculty.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mental faculty is due to the purity of the sense field of phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of phenomena is due to the purity of the sense field of the eyes.🔽The purity of the sense field of the eyes is due to the purity of the sense field of sights.🔽The purity of the sense field of sights is due to the purity of the sense field of sounds.🔽The purity of the sense field of sounds is due to the purity of the sense field of smells.🔽The purity of the sense field of smells is due to the purity of the sense field of tastes.🔽The purity of the sense field of tastes is due to the purity of the sense field of the body.🔽The purity of the sense field of the body is due to the purity of the sense field of phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of phenomena is due to the purity of the sense field of the mental faculty.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mental faculty is due to the purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha.🔽The purity of the distinct qualities of the Buddha is due to the purity of the sense field of the mental faculty.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mental faculty is due to the purity of the sense field of phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of phenomena is due to the purity of the sense field of the eyes.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the eyes is due to the purity of the sense field of sights

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sensory experience of the tongue is the purity of the knowledge of all things.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the tongue, the purity of the sensory element of tastes, the purity of the sensory element of tongue consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of tongue contact are the same as the purity of the sensory element of the eyes, the purity of the sensory element of sights, the purity of the sensory element of eye consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of eye contact.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the body, the purity of the sensory element of tangibles, the purity of the sensory element of body consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of body contact are the same as the purity of the sensory element of the eyes, the purity of the sensory element of sights, the purity of the sensory element of eye consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of eye contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the mind, the purity of the sensory element of mental phenomena, the purity of the sensory element of mind consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of mind contact are the same as the purity of the sensory element of the eyes, the purity of the sensory element of sights, the purity of the sensory element of eye consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of eye contact.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the eyes, the purity of the sensory element of sights, the purity of the sensory element of eye consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of eye contact are the same as the purity of the sensory element of the ears, the purity of the sensory element of sounds, the purity of the sensory element of ear consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of ear contact.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the nose, the purity of the sensory element of smells, the purity of the sensory element of nose consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of nose contact are the same as the purity of the sensory element of the eyes, the purity of the sensory element of sights, the purity of the sensory element of eye consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of eye contact.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the tongue, the purity of the sensory element of tastes, the purity of the sensory element of tongue consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of tongue contact are the same as the purity of the sensory element of the eyes, the purity of the sensory element of sights, the purity of the sensory element of eye consciousness, and the purity of the sensory element of eye contact.🔽The purity of the sensory element

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of body are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin @95b tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin @95b tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of mind is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of mind and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

translated: The purity of the knowledge of the tongue is the purity of the knowledge of the body.🔽The purity of the knowledge of the body is the purity of the knowledge of the thinking-mind.🔽The purity of the knowledge of the thinking-mind is the purity of the knowledge of form.🔽The purity of the knowledge of form is the purity of the knowledge of sound.🔽The purity of the knowledge of sound is the purity of the knowledge of smell.🔽The purity of the knowledge of smell is the purity of the knowledge of taste.

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: The purity of the result of the stream-winner is the purity of the result of the once-returner.🔽The purity of the result of the once-returner is the purity of the result of the non-returner.🔽The purity of the result of the non-returner is the purity of the result of the worthy one.🔽The purity of the result of the worthy one is the purity of the pratyekabuddha’s awakening.🔽The purity of the pratyekabuddha’s awakening is the purity of the result of the Great Vehicle.🔽The purity of the result of the Great Vehicle is the purity of the ten powers.🔽The purity of the ten powers is the purity of the four fearlessnesses.🔽The purity of the four fearlessnesses is the purity of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: de ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the purity of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The purity of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of concentration.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of the perfection of skillful means.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas @118a *//
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas @118a *//
translated: The purity of the perfection of skillful means is the purity of the perfection of aspiration.🔽The purity of the perfection of aspiration is the purity of the perfection of strength.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of strength is the purity of the perfection of knowledge.🔽The purity of the perfection of knowledge is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity

original: de ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, arhatship is one thing and the purification of contact at the threshold of mind is another; thus, there are not two.🔽

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha ma dad do ////
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha ma dad do ////
translated: Thus, the purity of arhatship and the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible, they cannot be separated, they are not different, and they are not divided.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya gya gsum pa /
analyzed: bam po brgya gya gsum pa /
translated: Volume 103

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the realization of the pratyekabuddhas is the purity of form.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the realization of the pratyekabuddhas and the purity of form and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible, they cannot be separated, they are not different, and they are not divided.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purity of self-awakening is the purity of feeling.

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of feeling is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de; gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of self-awakening and the purity of feeling and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two, and they are not broken apart, not separable, and not cut apart.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purity of self-awakening is the purity of perception.

original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid @118b rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid @118b rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of perception is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of self-awakening and the purity of perception and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two, and they are not broken apart, not separable, and not cut apart.🔽“The purity of self-awakening is the purity of formative predispositions.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purity of formative predispositions is due to the purity of individual enlightenment.

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of omniscience is due to the purity of formative predispositions.

original: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of individual enlightenment and the purity of formative predispositions and the purity of omniscience are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not discriminated and are not unconnected.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purity of consciousness is due to the purity of individual enlightenment.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of omniscience is due to the purity of consciousness.

original: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of individual enlightenment and the purity of consciousness and the purity of omniscience are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two and are not divided.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of self-awakening is the purity of the eyes.

original: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the eyes is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of self-awakening and the purity of the eyes and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rang byang chub @119a *//
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rang byang chub @119a *//
translated: They are not two and are not divided.

original: rnam par dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of self-awakening is the purity of the ears.

original: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the ears is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of self-awakening and the purity of the ears and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is indivisible, not two, and cannot be made two.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the nose is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of self-awakening and the purity of the nose and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible: they cannot be made two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are indivisible, not two, and cannot be made two.

analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas lce rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of self-awakening is the purity of the tongue.

original: lce rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the tongue is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of self-awakening and the purity of the tongue and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible: they cannot be made two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are indivisible, not two, and cannot be made two.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa /
translated: Thus, the purity of individual enlightenment and the purity of the body and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two.🔽They are not divided, not discriminated.🔽“The purity of individual enlightenment is the purity of the mind.

original: lus rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the mind is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purity of individual enlightenment and the purity of the mind and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two.🔽They are not divided, not discriminated.🔽“The purity of individual enlightenment is the purity of dharmas.🔽The purity of dharmas is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam @119b par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam @119b par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of individual enlightenment and the purity of dharmas and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not divided, not discriminated.🔽“The purity of individual enlightenment is the purity of the applications of mindfulness.

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the applications of mindfulness is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purity of individual enlightenment and the purity of the applications of mindfulness and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two.🔽They are not divided, not discriminated.🔽“The purity of individual enlightenment is the purity of the right efforts.

original: yid rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the right efforts is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purity of individual enlightenment and the purity of the right efforts and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two.🔽They are not divided, not discriminated.🔽“The purity of individual enlightenment is the purity of the legs of miraculous power.🔽The purity of the legs of miraculous power is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, the purity of individual enlightenment and the purity of the legs of miraculous power and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing and not two.🔽They are not divided, not discriminated.🔽“The purity of individual enlightenment is the purity of the faculties.🔽The purity of the faculties is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

translated: Thus, individual enlightenment is one thing and the purification of the ear consciousness another, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects yet another.

translated: The purity of the tongue consciousness is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening and the purity of the tongue consciousness and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual; they are not separate and not different.

translated: The purity of the sense field of contact is the purity of the sense field of feeling.🔽The purity of the sense field of feeling is the purity of the sense field of craving.🔽The purity of the sense field of craving is the purity of the sense field of appropriation.🔽The purity of the sense field of appropriation is the purity of the sense field of becoming.

translated: and the purity of the sensory element of auditory consciousness are indivisible:🔽they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct.🔽“The purity of the sensory element of the nose,🔽the purity of the sensory element of odors,🔽and the purity of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness are indivisible:

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct.🔽“The purity of the sensory element of the tongue,🔽the purity of the sensory element of tastes,

original: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: and the purity of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness are indivisible:🔽they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct.🔽“The purity of the sensory element of the body,🔽the purity of the sensory element of tangibles,🔽and the purity of the sensory element of tactile consciousness are indivisible:🔽they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct.🔽“The purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the purity of the sensory element of mental phenomena,🔽and

original: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, individual enlightenment is pure, the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the mind is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure. In this way, individual enlightenment and the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the mind are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two and cannot be made two.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purity of the knowledge of path aspects is the purity of form.

analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of path aspects and the purity of form and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two and cannot be made two.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purity of the knowledge of path aspects is the purity of feeling.

analyzed: tshor ba rnam par @123b dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of feeling is the purity of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not discriminated and are not unconnected.🔽Consciousness is pure due to the purity of the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

analyzed: de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par @124a *//

analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty, the purity of the sensory element of mental consciousness, and the purity of the perfection of wisdom are indivisible:🔽the purity

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of form and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, are not disconnected, and do not stray apart.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of feeling and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, are not disconnected, and do not stray apart.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /

original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha @135a *//
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha @135a *//
translated: The purity of the perfection of wisdom is due to the purity of perception.

original: rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of perception and the purity of the perfection of wisdom are not two and are not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not separated, and not cut apart.

analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sgra rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su @136b med de /

analyzed: chos rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par @137a *// dag pa ste / de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / chos rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the perfection of wisdom is due to the purity of the Dharma.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: Thus, this purity of the knowledge of all aspects, purity of the Dharma, and purity of the perfection of wisdom is not dual and cannot be made dual, is not separate, and is not cut off.🔽The purity of the eye consciousness is due to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of wisdom is due to the purity of the eye consciousness.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of eye consciousness and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, are not disconnected, and do not diverge from the Dharma-­dhātu.

translated: Thus, Subhūti, this purity of the sense-field of the mind and this purity of the perfection of wisdom are not two,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of wisdom is due to the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue and the purity of the perfection of wisdom are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, are not cut apart, and are not multiple.🔽The purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body is due to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of wisdom is due to the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la @140a *//
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la @140a *//
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects, the purification of the contact at the body sense-sphere condition, and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are indivisible, they are not separated, and they cannot be made into two.

original: gnyis su med de /
analyzed: gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the conditioned arising of feeling through the condition of contact at the body sense-sphere and the purification of the perfection of wisdom are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽The purification of the conditioned arising of feeling through the condition of contact at the mind sense-sphere is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the conditioned arising of feeling through the condition of contact at the mind sense-sphere is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the resultant feeling from eye contact are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: There is no duality here.

translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose is due to the purity of omniscience.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The perfection of meditative stability is pure because of the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the conditioned arising of feeling that has tongue contact as its condition and the purification of the perfection of concentration are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the conditioned arising of feeling that has tongue contact as its condition is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
