original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of meditative stabilization is due to the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded and the purity of the perfection of meditative stabilization are not two and cannot be made two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, they are not cut apart, they are not different.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of form is due to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of perseverance is due to the purity of form.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of form and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two and cannot be made two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided, nor is it cut asunder.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽tshor ba rnam par dag pas brtson @146a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa / tshor ba rnam par dag pas brtson @146a *//
translated: The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of patience.

original: 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of giving.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of the perfection of giving are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: nor are they divided, nor are they cut asunder.🔽The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of the perfection of morality.

analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects, the purification of perception, and the purification of the perfection of perseverance are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of volitional factors and the purification of the perfection of perseverance are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of consciousness and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two and cannot be made two.🔽They are not broken apart, not separated, and not cut apart.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not separated, and not cut apart.

original: sgra rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: The perfection of perseverance is pure because sound is pure.🔽Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of sound and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two and cannot be divided into two, are not broken apart, and are not cut apart.🔽The purity of smell is due to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The perfection of perseverance is pure because smell is pure.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sgra rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sgra rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of smell and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two and cannot be divided into two, are not broken apart, and are not cut apart.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas dri rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas dri rnam par dag pa /
translated: Purity of smell is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dri rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dri rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: dri rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dri rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of smell.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, purity of the knowledge of all aspects and purity of smell and purity of the perfection of perseverance are without duality and cannot be made dual; they are not separate and not cut off.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas ro rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas ro rnam par dag pa /
translated: Purity of taste is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: ro rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: ro rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of taste.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / ro rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / ro rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, purity of the knowledge of all aspects and purity of taste and purity of the perfection of perseverance are without duality and cannot be made dual; they are not separate and not cut off.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rnam @148a *// pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas reg rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam @148a *// pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas reg rnam par dag pa /
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided, nor is it cut apart.

original: reg rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: reg rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of contact is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / reg rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / reg rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of contact and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided, nor are they cut apart.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas chos rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas chos rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of phenomena is the purity of the knowledge of paths.

original: chos rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / chos rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: chos rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / chos rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The perfection of perseverance is pure because of the purity of the Dharma. Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects, the purity of the Dharma, and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two and not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, not fractured, and not destroyed.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the eye consciousness is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pan yid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects, the purity of the eye consciousness, and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two and not divided.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i rnam @148b par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided, nor is it cut in half.🔽The purity of the ear consciousness is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of the ear consciousness and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the nose consciousness and the perfection of perseverance are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two and cannot be split into two.🔽The purification of the nose consciousness and the perfection of perseverance are indivisible.🔽They are not two and cannot be split into two.

translated: They are not two and cannot be split into two.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa @149a *// rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of the body consciousness.

translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and are not different.🔽The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is the purity of the mind consciousness.

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects, the purification of the mind consciousness, and the purification of the perfection of perseverance are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not make different distinctions.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: “The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of eye contact is the purification of the perfection of perseverance.🔽Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of eye contact and the purification of the perfection of perseverance are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not make different distinctions.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: “The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of ear contact.🔽The purification of ear contact is the purification of the perfection of perseverance.🔽Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of ear contact and the purification of the perfection of perseverance are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not make different distinctions.

original: rnam pa @149b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa @149b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the ear as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the nose as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the tongue as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the body as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the thinking-mind as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, this purity of the perfection of perseverance and this purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one and the same thing, they are not two, not divided, not cut apart.🔽The purity of the eye as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the ear as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the nose as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the tongue as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the body as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the thinking-mind as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of patience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, Subhūti, this purity of the perfection of patience and this purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one and the same thing, they are not two, not divided, not cut apart.🔽The purity of the eye as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the ear as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the nose as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of morality.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the tongue as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the body as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the thinking-mind as sense-sphere is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus, Subhūti, this purity of the perfection of morality and this purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one and the same thing, they are not two, not divided, not cut apart.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of nose contact and the perfection of perseverance are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, not different.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa; lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa; lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of tongue contact. The purification of tongue contact is the purification of the perfection of perseverance.🔽Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of tongue contact and the perfection of perseverance are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, not different.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam @150a *// par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /

translated: “The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory element of the eyes.

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory element of the eyes is the purification of the perfection of perseverance.

translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the sensory element of the eyes and the purification of the perfection of perseverance are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not waver.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the sense-field of phenomena.🔽Thus, this purity of the sense-field of phenomena and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two and are not divided.🔽They are not broken apart and are not distinct.🔽The purity of the sense-field of phenomena is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the sense-field of phenomena.🔽Thus, this purity of the sense-field of phenomena and the purity of the perfection of morality are not two and are not divided.🔽They are not broken apart and are not distinct.🔽The purity of the sense-field of phenomena is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the sense-field of phenomena.🔽Thus, this purity of the sense-field of phenomena and the purity of the perfection of giving are not two and are not divided.🔽They are not broken apart and are not distinct.🔽The purity of the sense-field of phenomena is the purity of the perfection of patience.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact and the purification of the perfection of patience are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, are not disconnected, and do not diverge.🔽“The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.🔽The purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is the purification of the perfection of patience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact and the purification of the perfection of patience are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, are not disconnected, and do not diverge.🔽“The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.🔽The purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is the purification of the perfection of patience.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact and the purification of the perfection of patience are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, are not disconnected, and do not diverge.🔽“The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.🔽The purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is the purification of the perfection of patience.

analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / @156a *//
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact and the purification of the perfection of patience are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, are not disconnected, and do not diverge.🔽“The purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact is the purification of the perfection of patience.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they cut apart.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang /

translated: The purity of the perfection of patience is due to the purity of the sense-field of sounds.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is due to the purity of the sense-field of sounds.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of the sense-field of sounds and the purity of the perfection of patience are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided, nor are they cut apart.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the perfection of patience is due to the purity of the sense-field of smells.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The perfection of patience is pure because the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and a smell is pure.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the knowledge of all aspects and the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and a smell and the purity of the perfection of patience are not two and cannot be made two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: They are not broken apart, not separated, and not cut apart.🔽The purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and a taste is due to the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha @156b rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha @156b rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The perfection of patience is pure because the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and a taste is pure.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the resultant feeling that arises from contact that is the union of tongue and taste are not two and cannot be divided into two.

translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and are not different.🔽The purification of the resultant feeling that arises from contact that is the union of body and tangible objects is the purification of the perfection of patience.

translated: Thus, the purification of the knowledge of all aspects and the purification of the resultant feeling that arises from contact that is the union of body and tangible objects and the purification of the perfection of patience are not two and cannot be divided into two.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
